name: Transporter
description:
Transporter is a small, modern transport simulation game with classic, oldschool grid environment, and newest features and options. Combining realistic simulation with indie style to create a game that is easy to pick up and get into, but with enough depth and variety to remain interesting and satisfying for experienced transport sim players.

RAIL, ROAD AND WATER

Create new transport routes on rail, road and water. Stock industries with raw materials. Drive the production and economy. Deliver materials and cargo to consumers. Supply power plants to generate electricity. Watch cities grow, deliver their passengers across the world, and build your own transport company.

MODERN TRANSPORT

Utilize the latest technological advancements, like maglev trains, experimental hydrogen-powered locomotives, and electric autonomous vehicles to transport your cargo. Dive into new features like rolling stock switching, cargo refrigeration, and different bulk-loading stations, or create fully customizable multi-trailer rigs and tugboats with different barges. Combine all types of transport to create the most efficient transport infrastructure and build your perfect transport world.

VARIETY OF INDUSTRY

Transporter comes with over 50 different industries and over 40 types of cargo to transport (and more to come). From farms and mines to modern industries, like Material Recovery Facility that process recyclables or Electric Arc Furnace, which requires electricity to turn scrap metal into steel. Whether you decide to transport passengers with high-speed trains, transform raw materials into solar panels for a new solar farm, or deliver pharmaceutical material to a local hospital is up to you.

LEVEL AND SCENARIO EDITOR

Game features custom-made procedural terrain generation with tons of options to give you full control to create an endless variety of maps for you to conquer.
Not satisfied with the map you created? No problem. Edit them to your liking or create your own maps from scratch in the Level editor or create Scenarios with different goals and rules to create your own unique challenge.
